item.title: He’s the one who wrote the verse in Tamil for the record collection ‘ KGF! ‘
item.dc:creator: admin

The song is recorded in Tamil and dubbed in India. When the film was released, the film had no expectations. Two days later, after the […]

The post He’s the one who wrote the verse in Tamil for the record collection ‘ KGF! ‘ appeared first on Hatsoff Machi.
item.content:encoded:
Vijay Sethupathi’s friend Nagarajanthan was the author of the Tamil version of ‘KGF’.

KGF’ has recently been released in actors in Kannada, including Yash, Srinithi, Anand Nag and Prasanth Neal. The song is recorded in Tamil and dubbed in India. When the film was released, the film had no expectations. Two days later, after the movie was released, it became popular with fans. The film’s story and the youth were more interested in seeing the film in vogue.

Beyond the film’s story, all its verses are mimams. You’ll be surprised to hear who wrote this film’s dialogue. Vijay Sethupathi is the film’s tremendously talented actor.

The post He’s the one who wrote the verse in Tamil for the record collection ‘ KGF! ‘ appeared first on Hatsoff Machi.
